channel.title: My 508 won't load - stops at "connecting to update server"
channel.description:
Hey, as said in title it stops when it reaches "Connecting to update server" I've found out through other threads in here, that you need some "caches", and this is what i got:
.titana_cache_32 - In this folder is: cache508 runescape random.dat (i guess it's .dat ;s) Uninstal
.titana_cache_32 is located in C: -> Windows
Does anyone has a clue on how to solve this, i'm really desperate.

item.title: My 508 won't load - stops at "connecting to update server"

try copying cache508 into ur c drive…idk
